attributes.action: Re-locate all prisoners to an underwater secure facility in some kind of futuristic bubble city at the bottom of the sea
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should we have to look at those ugly yucky prison buildings? Lets build a fantastic state of the art sort of space 1999 meets the abyss futuristic bubble structure under the sea. There we can house all our nasty criminals, and we wont even have to look at them. Once their time is served, they can be shot out of a kind of tube-like construction and returned to blighty, somewhere near eastbourne. You know it makes sense.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
